displayName: Catppuccin Code Icons for the high spirited!
name: catppuccin-code-icons
description: Soothing pastel code icons for the high spirited!

scripts.svgo: bunx --bun svgo -f ./icons/mocha --config svgo.config.js && bunx --bun svgo -f ./icons/macchiato --config svgo.config.js && bunx --bun svgo -f ./icons/frappe --config svgo.config.js && bunx --bun svgo -f ./icons/latte --config svgo.config.js
scripts.sprite: bun run ./scripts/svg-sprite.js --outDir dist/mocha --outFile catppuccin-code-icons.svg --flavour mocha && bun run ./scripts/svg-sprite.js --outDir dist/macchiato --outFile catppuccin-code-icons.svg --flavour macchiato && bun run ./scripts/svg-sprite.js --outDir dist/frappe --outFile catppuccin-code-icons.svg --flavour frappe && bun run ./scripts/svg-sprite.js --outDir dist/latte --outFile catppuccin-code-icons.svg --flavour latte
scripts.fonts: bun run ./scripts/build.js --flavour mocha && bun run ./scripts/build.js --flavour macchiato && bun run ./scripts/build.js --flavour frappe && bun run ./scripts/build.js --flavour latte
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run svgo && bun run fonts && bun run sprite

author: MuntasirSZN
